theme: Draw out also the spear. Psalm 35:3

verses.2025-03-09: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom – James 1:5, Proverbs 9:10, Job 28:28
verses.2025-03-16: For it is by grace you have been saved – Romans 3:24, Ephesians 2:8-9
verses.2025-03-23: If my people who are called by my name – 1 John 1:9, Proverbs 28:13, 2 Chronicles 7:14, Acts 3:19
verses.2025-03-30: For the kingdom of heaven is at hand – 2 Chronicles 30:9B, 2 Peter 3:9, Matthew 4:17, Matthew 9:13
